languages.text: {n}Соломон старательно, даже ревностно драит шваброй палубу. Его глаза зорко высматривают малейшее пятнышко грязи, чтобы немедленно вынести ему суровый очистительный приговор.{/n}
{n}Solomorne is mopping the deck with diligence verging on zeal. He scrutinises the floor for the slightest speck of dirt, primed and ready to hand down his harsh sentence: intensive scrubbing.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Соломон старательно, даже ревностно драит шваброй палубу. Его глаза зорко высматривают малейшее пятнышко грязи, чтобы немедленно вынести ему суровый очистительный приговор.{/n}

languages.text: {n}ソロモーンは、熱意すら感じさせるほどの勤勉さでデッキのモップがけをしている。彼は床の上をじっくりと見つめ、わずかな汚れすら見逃さない。徹底的なゴシゴシ掃除という厳しい判決いつでも下せるようにしている。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne is mopping the deck with diligence verging on zeal. He scrutinises the floor for the slightest speck of dirt, primed and ready to hand down his harsh sentence: intensive scrubbing.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ソロモーンは、熱意すら感じさせるほどの勤勉さでデッキのモップがけをしている。彼は床の上をじっくりと見つめ、わずかな汚れすら見逃さない。徹底的なゴシゴシ掃除という厳しい判決いつでも下せるようにしている。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Solomorne wischt das Deck mit einer Gründlichkeit, die an Fanatismus grenzt. Er prüft den Boden auf den kleinsten Fleck und verhängt umgehend eine harte Strafe: intensives Schrubben.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne is mopping the deck with diligence verging on zeal. He scrutinises the floor for the slightest speck of dirt, primed and ready to hand down his harsh sentence: intensive scrubbing.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne wischt das Deck mit einer Gründlichkeit, die an Fanatismus grenzt. Er prüft den Boden auf den kleinsten Fleck und verhängt umgehend eine harte Strafe: intensives Schrubben.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Solomorne lave le pont avec une diligence qui confine à l'obsession. Il scrute le sol à la recherche de la moindre saleté, paré à exécuter sa terrible sentence : le récurage en règle.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne is mopping the deck with diligence verging on zeal. He scrutinises the floor for the slightest speck of dirt, primed and ready to hand down his harsh sentence: intensive scrubbing.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne lave le pont avec une diligence qui confine à l'obsession. Il scrute le sol à la recherche de la moindre saleté, paré à exécuter sa terrible sentence : le récurage en règle.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Solomorne pasa la fregona por la cubierta con una diligencia que raya el fanatismo. Escudriña el suelo buscando el más mínimo indicio de suciedad, listo para ajusticiarla como merece: con un fregoteo intensivo.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne is mopping the deck with diligence verging on zeal. He scrutinises the floor for the slightest speck of dirt, primed and ready to hand down his harsh sentence: intensive scrubbing.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne pasa la fregona por la cubierta con una diligencia que raya el fanatismo. Escudriña el suelo buscando el más mínimo indicio de suciedad, listo para ajusticiarla como merece: con un fregoteo intensivo.{/n}

languages.text: {n}索罗蒙正以近乎狂热的干劲擦拭着甲板。他仔仔细细地检查着地板，寻找着最微不足道的污垢，随时准备下达严厉的判决——集中擦洗。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne is mopping the deck with diligence verging on zeal. He scrutinises the floor for the slightest speck of dirt, primed and ready to hand down his harsh sentence: intensive scrubbing.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}索罗蒙正以近乎狂热的干劲擦拭着甲板。他仔仔细细地检查着地板，寻找着最微不足道的污垢，随时准备下达严厉的判决——集中擦洗。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Solomorne; güverteyi büyük titizlikle paspaslıyor, en ufak bir kir zerresini arayıp buluyor ve bulduğu an ağır hükmünü verip hararetle ovalıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne is mopping the deck with diligence verging on zeal. He scrutinises the floor for the slightest speck of dirt, primed and ready to hand down his harsh sentence: intensive scrubbing.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne güverteyi büyük titizlikle paspaslar, en ufak bir kir zerresini arayıp bulur, bulduğu an ağır hükmünü verir: hararetli ovalama cezası.{/n}
